fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Environment, Research and innovation, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Pesticide and MRL regulations. Biotechnology regulations and Low Level Presence Policies.  Development of regulations overseeing new plant breeding technologies.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Canada Grains Council is the national umbrella organization representing the grain, oilseed, pulse and special crop industries. The CGC’s mission is to lead, facilitate and support policy development and implementation on cross commodity issues and opportunities. Canada Grains Council membership includes representatives from all segments of the value chain (producers, grain handlers/exporters, input suppliers, and processors) and all of the major commodity organizations. The Canada Grains Council strives to build consensus and speak as one voice on the issues that matter to our sector.
